content: sparkly crochet star by little crochet you will need - a 3 5 crochet hook - dk yarn in 1 colour approx 10g - small quantity of metallized/sparkly yarn - tapestry needle - scissors abbreviations/stitches used - chain chain - st stitch - slip_stitch slip_stitch - double_crochet double_crochet = us single_crochet - treble_crochet treble_crochet = us double_crochet - picot ch3 slip_stitch into 1st chain to form a small ring - fo fasten_off chain 1 tightly pull up long loop cut off yarn notes - uk terminology is used throughout - pattern is worked in the round hold dk yarn and metallized yarn together for a sparkly effect pattern ch4 slip_stitch to 1st chain to form ring ch1 round 1 working into ring *1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet picot 1 treble_crochet repeat from * 4 more times slip_stitch into ring fo weave in ends hanging loop rejoin yarn into tip of one branch ch16 slip_stitch into slip_stitch back into tip of branch fo weave in all ends chart slip_stitch chain double_crochet treble picot how to make a picot ch3 slip_stitch into back of 1st chain photo above left showing front of chain above centre showing completed picot go on to next st above right showing picot in blue and next st in red © little crochet blog http //www littlecrochet com/ facebook https //www facebook com/maries little crochet instagram @little_crochet__ thank you for using this pattern you are welcome to sell the resulting products however the pattern itself is not for resale and should not be reproduced without a mention of my name and social media details happy hooking
